languages.text: "Ага. Династия Чорда. Одни из самых влиятельных Вольных Торговцев Простора Коронус. Но не на Футфоле, который контролирует династия Винтерскейл. Сдается мне, сейчас мы будем слушать крайне любопытные предложения..." {n}— вполголоса, так, чтобы было слышно только вам, замечает Абеляр.{/n}

"Chorda, hmm. They are some of the most influential Rogue Traders in the Koronus Expanse. But not on Footfall — this station is under the control of House Winterscale. Something tells me that we are about to hear a most curious offer..." {n}says Abelard under his breath so that only you can hear him.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ага. Династия Чорда. Одни из самых влиятельных Вольных Торговцев Простора Коронус. Но не на Футфоле, который контролирует династия Винтерскейл. Сдается мне, сейчас мы будем слушать крайне любопытные предложения..." {n}— вполголоса, так, чтобы было слышно только вам, замечает Абеляр.{/n}

Something tells me that we are about to hear a most curious offer..." {n}Abelard is speaking under his breath so that only you could hear him.{/n}

Something tells me that we are about to hear a most curious offer..." {n}says Abelard under his breath so that only you can hear him.{/n}

"Chorda, hmm. They are some of the most influential Rogue Traders in the Koronus Expanse. But not on Footfall — this station is under the control of House Winterscale. Something tells me that we are about to hear a most curious offer..." {n}says Abelard under his breath so that only you can hear him.{/n}

languages.text: 「チョーダ家ですか、なるほど。彼らはコロヌス・エクスパンスでもっとも影響力のある自由開拓者のひとりです。しかし、フットフォールではそこまでの力はないはず―このステーションはウィンタースケール家の管理下にありますので。なんだか奇妙な申し出を耳にするであろうという予感がします…」{n}アベラルドはこちらにしか聞こえない声で静かに話す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Chorda, hmm. They are some of the most influential Rogue Traders in the Koronus Expanse. But not on Footfall — this station is under the control of House Winterscale. Something tells me that we are about to hear a most curious offer..." {n}says Abelard under his breath so that only you can hear him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「チョーダ家ですか、なるほど。彼らはコロヌス・エクスパンスでもっとも影響力のある自由開拓者のひとりです。しかし、フットフォールではそこまでの力はないはず―このステーションはウィンタースケール家の管理下にありますので。なんだか奇妙な申し出を耳にするであろうという予感がします…」{n}アベラルドはこちらにしか聞こえない声で静かに話す。{/n}

languages.text: “库尔达，嗯。这个家族是整个科罗努斯扩区最有影响力的行商浪人家族之一，但他们在落脚港的影响力相当有限，这个星站由温特斯凯尔家族控制。我的直觉告诉我，恐怕我们会听到非常有趣的提议……”{n}阿贝拉德低声对你开了口，声音低得只有你能听见。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Chorda, hmm. They are some of the most influential Rogue Traders in the Koronus Expanse. But not on Footfall — this station is under the control of House Winterscale. Something tells me that we are about to hear a most curious offer..." {n}says Abelard under his breath so that only you can hear him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “库尔达，嗯。这个家族是整个科罗努斯扩区最有影响力的行商浪人家族之一，但他们在落脚港的影响力相当有限，这个星站由温特斯凯尔家族控制。我的直觉告诉我，恐怕我们会听到非常有趣的提议……”{n}阿贝拉德低声对你开了口，声音低得只有你能听见。{/n}

languages.text: «Chorda, ajá. Son de los Comerciantes Independientes más influyentes de la Extensión de Koronus, pero en Paso no. Esta estación la controla la casa Winterscale. Algo me dice que nos va a llegar una oferta de lo más curiosa...», {n}dice Abelard en voz baja para que solo tú lo oigas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Chorda, hmm. They are some of the most influential Rogue Traders in the Koronus Expanse. But not on Footfall — this station is under the control of House Winterscale. Something tells me that we are about to hear a most curious offer..." {n}says Abelard under his breath so that only you can hear him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Chorda, ajá. Son de los Comerciantes Independientes más influyentes de la Extensión de Koronus, pero en Paso no. Esta estación la controla la casa Winterscale. Algo me dice que nos va a llegar una oferta de lo más curiosa...», {n}dice Abelard en voz baja para que solo tú lo oigas.{/n}

languages.text: « Hmm, les Chorda... Ils font partie des libres-marchands les plus influents des Étendues de Koronus, mais ils n'ont guère de pouvoir à Castel, qui est sous le contrôle de la maison Winterscale. Quelque chose me dit que nous allons entendre une proposition des plus intrigantes... » {n}commente Abélard à voix basse pour que vous {mf|seul|seule} puissiez l'entendre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Chorda, hmm. They are some of the most influential Rogue Traders in the Koronus Expanse. But not on Footfall — this station is under the control of House Winterscale. Something tells me that we are about to hear a most curious offer..." {n}says Abelard under his breath so that only you can hear him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Hmm, les Chorda... Ils font partie des libres-marchands les plus influents des Étendues de Koronus, mais ils n'ont guère de pouvoir à Castel, qui est sous le contrôle de la maison Winterscale. Quelque chose me dit que nous allons entendre une proposition des plus intrigantes... » {n}commente Abélard à voix basse pour que vous {mf|seul|seule} puissiez l'entendre.{/n}

languages.text: "Chorda, hmm. Sie gehören zu den einflussreichsten Freihändlern in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Aber nicht auf Footfall – diese Station steht unter der Kontrolle des Hause Winterzunder. Ich habe das Gefühl, wir werden gleich ein höchst ungewöhnliches Angebot erhalten ...", {n}sagt Abelard so leise, dass nur du ihn hören kannst.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Chorda, hmm. They are some of the most influential Rogue Traders in the Koronus Expanse. But not on Footfall — this station is under the control of House Winterscale. Something tells me that we are about to hear a most curious offer..." {n}says Abelard under his breath so that only you can hear him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Chorda, hmm. Sie gehören zu den einflussreichsten Freihändlern in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Aber nicht auf Footfall – diese Station steht unter der Kontrolle des Hause Winterzunder. Ich habe das Gefühl, wir werden gleich ein höchst ungewöhnliches Angebot erhalten ...", {n}sagt Abelard so leise, dass nur du ihn hören kannst.{/n}

languages.text: "Chorda ha? Koronus Enginliği'nin en sözü geçen Hür Tacirlerinden olsalar da Binliman'da boruları ötmüyor. Bu istasyon, Winterscale Hanesi'nin egemenliğinde. İçimden bir ses, çok ilginç bir teklif almak üzere olduğumuzu söylüyor." {n}diyor Abelard, yalnızca senin duyabileceğin şekilde mırıldanarak.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Chorda, hmm. They are some of the most influential Rogue Traders in the Koronus Expanse. But not on Footfall — this station is under the control of House Winterscale. Something tells me that we are about to hear a most curious offer..." {n}says Abelard under his breath so that only you can hear him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Chorda ha? Koronus Enginliği'nin en nüfuzlu Hür Tacirlerinden birisi anca Binliman, onların bölgesi değil. Bu istasyon, Winterscale Hanesi'nin egemenliğinde. İçimden bir ses, çok ilginç bir teklif almak üzere olduğumuzu söylüyor…" {n}Abelard, yalnızca senin duyabileceğin şekilde mırıldanarak konuşuyor.{/n}
